feed.title: Immich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.125.2
entry.content:
v1.125.2

This release addresses the following issues, most of which originate from our migration to Kysely.

  • Fixed a bug where the timeline shows a placeholder in some sections
  • Fixed a bug where using server URL with sslmode doesn't get parsed correctly
  • Fixed a bug where LivePhotos doesn't generate thumbnails
  • Fixed a bug where no EXIF data is returned for the deduplication view
  • Fixed a bug where albums with archived assets don't show up on the mobile app
  • Fixed a bug where hard refresh only refreshed assets and not albums
  • Fixed a bug where the updatedAt column doesn't update on some assets and album actions
  • Fixed a bug where searchRandom doesn't return the correct data format

Thank you for reporting the bugs you have found! We added a treat to the login page as a thank you :smile:

Support Immich

If you find the project helpful, you can support Immich by purchasing a product key at https://buy.immich.app/.

Cheers! üçª

What's Changed

üåü Enhancements

  • feat(web): neon light behinds auth forms by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15570

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix(mobile): translation (no /api, experimental features) by @mmomjian in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15600
  • fix(server): getTimeBuckets not handling boolean filters correctly by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15567
  • fix(web): auth page padding by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15569
  • fix(server): set updatedAt on updates by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15573
  • fix(server): Fix for sorting faces during merging by @Lukasdotcom in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15571
  • fix(server): searchRandom response by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15580
  • fix: login page by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15613
  • fix(mobile): full refresh doesn't get albums by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15560
  • fix(server): link live photos by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15612
  • fix: demo login page by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15616
  • fix(server): no exif metadata in the deduplication utility by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15585
  • fix(mobile): deletion of single assets by @Saschl in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15597
  • fix(server): failed to get albums with archived assets by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15611
  • fix(server): migration mentions public schema by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15622
  • fix(mobile): failed to load ga/gl locale by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15623
  • fix(server): sslmode not working by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15587

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.125.1...v1.125.2

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.125.3
entry.content:
v1.125.3

This release continues the bug-squashing effort from migration to Kysely.

  • Fixed an issue where changing the machine learning model doesn't change the vector size requirement
  • Fixed an issue where the bulk location edit triggered an error
  • Fixed an issue where the album cannot be loaded in the mobile app if any of the assets in the album are in the trash
  • Fixed an issue where searchRandom endpoint doesn't return randomize items
  • Fixed some issues regarding the timezone topic

Support Immich

If you find the project helpful, you can support Immich by purchasing a product key at https://buy.immich.app/.

Cheers! üçª

What's Changed

üåü Enhancements

  • chore(server): print stack in case of worker error by @etnoy in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15632
  • fix: increase upload timeout by @jdicioccio in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15588
  • fix(mobile): improve timezone picker by @gaganyadav80 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15615

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix(server): changing vector dim size by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15630
  • fix(server): bulk update location by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15642
  • fix(server): do not reset fileCreatedDate by @C-Otto in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15650
  • fix(server): do not count deleted assets for album summary by @C-Otto in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15668
  • fix(server): avoid duplicate rows in album queries by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15670
  • fix(web): neon overflow on mobile screen by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15676
  • fix(server): /search/random API returns same assets every call by @sudbrack in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15682

New Contributors

  • @jdicioccio made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15588
  • @idkwhyiusethisname made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15637
  • @gaganyadav80 made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15615
  • @ferraridamiano made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15683
  • @sudbrack made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15682

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.125.2...v1.125.3

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.125.5
entry.content:
v1.125.5

We were about to release v1.125.4, then we found and fixed some more bugs, v1.125.5 it is!

  • Fixed a bug where the album page cannot be accessed if any album with its assets is in the trash.
  • Fixed a bug where deduplication detection doesn't return any result
  • Fixed a bug where the date picker component caused a rendering error if the app language was not in English

What's Changed

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix(web): sort folders by @C-Otto in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15691
  • fix(server): cannot render album page when all assets of an album are in trash by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15690
  • fix(server): duplicate detection by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15727
  • fix(mobile): locale option causes the datetime filter error out by @alextran1502 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15704

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.125.3...v1.125.5

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.125.6
entry.content:
v1.125.6

  • Fixed a bug where thumbnail generation job queue all person faces at midnight

What's Changed

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix(server): person thumbnail generation always being queued by @mertalev in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15734

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.125.5...v1.125.6

entry.title: New release for Immich: v1.125.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

üåü Enhancements

  • fix(server): Allow negative rating (for rejected images) by @chkuendig in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15699
  • feat: resolution selection and default preview playback for 360¬∞ panorama videos by @pastleo in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15747
  • feat: add support for JPEG 2000 by @ayykamp in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15710
  • fix(server): Update vaapi-wsl to include dxg by @Mraedis in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15759

üêõ Bug fixes

  • fix(web): do not throw error when hash fails by @RiggiG in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15740
  • fix(web): cancel people merge selection: do not show "Change name successfully" notification by @afv in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15744
  • fix: show local dates for range in album summary by @C-Otto in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15654
  • fix(server): restore user by @jrasm91 in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15763
  • fix(web): update recent album after edit by @antoniosarro in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15762

üåê Translations

  • chore: update of the Ukrainian translation by @OriginalSimon in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15751

New Contributors

  • @chkuendig made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15699
  • @RiggiG made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15740

  • @afv made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15744
  • @OriginalSimon made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15751
  • @bencochran made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15381
  • @antoniosarro made their first contribution in https://github.com/immich-app/immich/pull/15762

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immich-app/immich/compare/v1.125.6...v1.125.7
